vclaim: In 1856 U.S. House Rep. Preston Brooks brutally attacked Sen. Charles Sumner with a cane in the U.S. Senate chamber.
title: Did a U.S. Congressman Brutally Beat a Senator in the 19th Century?
subtitle: After U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi ripped up President Donald Trump's State of the Union speech, one journalist called it the "most classless act ever conducted in Congress." Others disagreed.
author: Dan MacGuill
